comment: In 1884 the magazine "Vsemirnaia Illiustrazia", in which the chess column was held by Chigorin himself, organized a correspondence chess tournament. There were 12 participants, each playing two game with everyone else. The tournament was easily won by Chigorin with 20 wins and 2 draws, 4 points ahead of the runner up. The games were then published, and the following game started a lot of lively discussions in the press in many countries.
reasoning: The comment does not explain the mistake made by the player as it discusses a historical chess tournament, not the specific move in question.
